model.description: The model version used for this response.

type.description: Indicates that the object is a message.

role.description: Always 'assistant' for responses generated by the model.

type.description: Type of content block, either text or tool usage.

text.description: The text generated by the assistant.

id.description: Unique identifier for this tool usage event.

name.description: The name of the tool used.

input.description: Input parameters provided to the tool.

content.description: An array of content blocks, which can be text or tool usage events.

stop_sequence.description: The custom stop sequence that was encountered, if applicable.

input_tokens.description: Number of tokens in the input.

output_tokens.description: Number of tokens in the output.

usage.description: Statistics on token usage for this request and response.
